name: spo-apply-pnptemplate-with-parameters
title: Use Invoke-PnPSiteTemplate with parameters
shortDescription: Sample showing how create a PnP Template and ADD parameters then use Invoke-PnPSiteTemplate with parameters
longDescription: Extract a PnP Provisioning Template, inject parameter tags, and apply the template using Invoke-PnPSiteTemplate -Parameters in order to name the Library and View in the current language ( LocaleId)

thumbnails.alt: Preview image of the sample Use Invoke-PnPSiteTemplate with parameters

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
